examples: a bum who is a Central Park fixture

definitions.text: a soldier in the regular army
a dependable follower (especially in party politics)
examples: he is one of the party regulars

definitions.text: a garment size for persons of average height and weight
in accordance with fixed order or procedure or principle
examples: his regular calls on his customers

definitions.text: conforming to a standard or pattern
examples: following the regular procedure of the legislature
at a regular meeting of the PTA

definitions.text: in accord with regular practice or procedure

examples: the even rhythm of his breathing

definitions.text: relating to a person who does something regularly
(used of the military) belonging to or engaged in by legitimate army forces
(of solids) having clear dimensions that can be measured; volume can be determined with a suitable geometric formula
not deviating from what is normal
